definition: should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°
you're most welcome/sure thing!/I did what I was supposed to do
Gaea, the Earth Goddess and mother of the Titans
Cain (name)/Cain (biblical character), a figure of Judeo-Christian-Muslim mythology

sentences.english: Moreover, the skull has features resembling those of contemporary Asians.
sentences.chinese: 此外，該頭骨具備類似現代亞洲人頭骨的特徵。

sentences.english: Made of specially-treated material, the coat is light in weight and machine washable.
sentences.chinese: 該大衣由經過特殊處理的面料做成，重量輕，可機洗。

sentences.english: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 該公司在加利福尼亞和俄勒岡州出售西瓜汁。

sentences.english: B. Replan the project without the resources.
sentences.chinese: 跑去資源重新計劃該項目。

sentences.english: The Console should indicate that both subscribers received a copy of the message.
sentences.chinese: 控制檯應該指示兩個訂戶均收到了該消息的複本。

sentences.english: It is really a nonclassical communication system.
sentences.chinese: 該系統爲一非古典通信系統。

sentences.english: Here, the Asia Water Project summarises the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 以下是亞洲水資源項目對該論題的概述。

sentences.english: This system encourages not only internal promotions but lateral moves as well.
sentences.chinese: 該系統不僅鼓勵內部升職也支持平職調換。

sentences.english: Security officials rushed down the main aisle to detain the woman.
sentences.chinese: 安全官員立馬衝進主通道，扣留了該名女子。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 該集團還推出了太陽鏡和化妝品等新的副產品。

sentences.english: The report cited several societal and economic reasons for the jump.
sentences.chinese: 該報告引用了一些社會和經濟原因解釋這一跨越。

sentences.english: Finding should change standard of care, which is 4 doses every 3 weeks, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究員說該發現將改變每3周4次給藥的治療標準。

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 貢獻者組成的團隊一般負責該項目區域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: If you do, two loyalty counters are removed from that planeswalker.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此做，從該旅法師上移去兩個忠誠度指示物。

sentences.english: Agency officials say the country's weak drug laws are compounding the problem.
sentences.chinese: 該機構官員說，該國薄弱的禁毒法使問題複雜化。

sentences.english: What time shall I set the alarm (clock) for?
sentences.chinese: 我該把鬧鐘撥到幾點鐘響？

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
